      • createComponent

        public static final Node createComponent(TransformationGraph graph,
                   java.lang.String componentType,
                   org.w3c.dom.Node nodeXML)
        Method for creating various types of Components based on component type & XML parameter definition.
        If component type is not registered, it tries to use componentType parameter directly as a class name.
        Parameters:
        componentType - Type of the component (e.g. SimpleCopy, Gather, Join ...)
        xmlNode - XML element containing appropriate Node parameters
        Returns:
        requested Component (Node) object or null if creation failed
        Since:
        May 27, 2002

      • createComponent

        public static final Node createComponent(TransformationGraph graph,
                   java.lang.String componentType,
                   org.w3c.dom.Node nodeXML,
                   boolean strict)
        Method for creating various types of Components based on component type & XML parameter definition.
        If component type is not registered, it tries to use componentType parameter directly as a class name. If the instance of the component cannot be created due failure in Node.fromXML() method and strict is false then dummy component implementation is returned. This dummy implementation provides only component id, type and name of the component.
        Parameters:
        componentType - Type of the component (e.g. SimpleCopy, Gather, Join ...)
        xmlNode - XML element containing appropriate Node parameters
        strict - if false errors in Node.fromXML() is ignored and dummy component implementation is returned
        Returns:
        requested Component (Node) object or null if creation failed
        Since:
        May 27, 2002

      • createDummyComponent

        public static final Node createDummyComponent(TransformationGraph graph,
                        java.lang.String componentType,
                        java.lang.Class<? extends Node> componentClass,
                        org.w3c.dom.Node nodeXML)
        Parameters:
        graph - parent graph
        componentType - component type
        nodeXML - xml definition
        Returns:
        dummy component implementation which provides only component id, name, type and component description

      • createComponent

        public static final Node createComponent(TransformationGraph graph,
                   java.lang.String componentType,
                   java.lang.Object[] constructorParameters,
                   java.lang.Class<?>[] parametersType)
        Method for creating various types of Components based on component type, parameters and theirs types for component constructor.
        If component type is not registered, it tries to use componentType parameter directly as a class name.
        i.e.
        Node reformatNode = ComponentFactory.createComponent(myGraph, "REFORMAT", new Object[] { "REF_UNIQUE_CNT", myRecordTransform}, new Class[] {String.class, RecordTransform.class});
        Parameters:
        graph -
        componentType -
        constructorParameters - parameters passed to component constructor
        parametersType - types of all constructor parameters
        Returns:

      • createComponent

        public static final Node createComponent(TransformationGraph graph,
                   java.lang.String componentType,
                   java.util.Properties properties)
        Method for creating various types of components based on component type and attributes passed as Properties.

      • createComponent

        public static final Node createComponent(TransformationGraph graph,
                   java.lang.String componentType,
                   java.lang.String componentId,
                   java.util.Properties properties)
        Method for creating various types of components based on component type, component id and attributes passed as Properties.
